source: This is permanent, but you can always pay to swap back. You never lose class levels, but you might gain some. The cost is based on whichever class has more DNA (shown to the left). Cost = {{%02%}} x DNA% (capped at {{%03%}}).
target: 这是永久的，但是你总能花费来交换回来，你永远不会失去职业等级，但你可能会获得一些，技能构筑也会被交换。价格基于更多DNA的职业决定 公式为 花费={{%02%}} x DNA% (最大为{{%03%}}).

source: Equip your favorite skills! This makes them appear more often when you level up in-game.
target: 装备你最喜欢的技能！这会让他们在游戏里更容易出现。

source: You need {{%01%}} DNA to reach Rare, {{%02%}} for Epic, and {{%03%}} for Legendary.
target: 你需要{{%01%}} DNA 达到稀有等级，{{%02%}}达到精英，{{%03%}}达到传奇。

source: Open flasks to get higher rarities on your skills. This makes them stronger. Also, when a skill becomes legendary, you are allowed to equip it to the top 2 slots of your build. Unlike the bottom 6 skills which are random, these top 2 skills always appear (at level {{%01%}}), and let you play your favorite skill every match!
target: 打开烧瓶，获得更稀有的技能。这会让它们变得更强。此外，当某个技能成为传奇技能时，您可以将其装备到您的建筑的前 2 个插槽中。与后6个技能的随机性不同，前2个技能总是会出现（当您在游戏中达到{{%01%}}级时），让你在每场比赛中都能使用自己最喜欢的技能！

source: Most skills shown in-game are random. But when you hit level {{%01%}} in-game you'll see 3 skill options instead of 2. The 2 on the right will show the top 2 slots of your build here. Then at level {{%03%}} you'll also see 3 options, and the 2 on the right are chosen randomly from the bottom section of your build. The far right slot can only be claimed if you first get {{%04%}} kills.
target: 游戏中显示的大多数技能都是随机的。但当你在游戏中达到{{%01%}}级时，你会看到 3 个技能选项，而不是 2 个。然后到了{{%03%}}级，你也会看到3个选项，右边的2个是从你的构建的底部随机选择的。只有先获得{{%04%}}的击杀，才能获得最右边的位置。

source: DNA lets you equip skills to your skill builds. You need {{%03%}} DNA to equip a skill as Rare, {{%02%}} as Epic, and {{%01%}} as Legendary.
target: DNA能让你把技能装备至你的技能构筑中，你需要{{%03%}}的DNA来装备一个稀有技能。{{%02%}}精英技能，和{{%01%}}传奇技能。

source: Starter flasks drop the same skills for all players.
target: 初始瓶会掉落预先选好的技能给所有玩家。

source: Has a {{%01%}}% chance to unlock new skills in the 3rd ring of the skill tree.
target: 有{{%01%}}%几率解锁技能树第三圈的技能。

source: Has a {{%01%}}% chance to unlock skills in the 3rd ring of the tree, and a {{%02%}}% chance for skills in the 4th ring.
target: 有几率{{%01%}}%解锁第三圈的技能和{{%02%}}%的几率解锁第四圈的技能。

source: When using a magnet with this flask, it is guaranteed to hit a good rarity and will never land on a common drop. This ensures at least {{%01%}} DNA (Rare, plus the bonus +{{%02%}} DNA magnets always give).
target: 如果你对此瓶子使用磁铁，会保证你获得好稀有度，至少给予{{%01%}}DNA(稀有，还有+{{%02%}}的磁铁来源).

source: Guaranteed to give at least an Epic drop of {{%01%}} DNA! Has a {{%03%}}% chance of a Legendary DNA drop (instead of the usual {{%04%}}%).
target: 保证至少提供{{%01%}}的史诗级降幅DNA！有{{%03%}}%的几率掉落传奇DNA（而不是通常的{{%04%}}%）。

source: Guaranteed to give a Legendary drop of {{%01%}} DNA! Also has a {{%02%}}% chance to drop a new legendary modifier (with duplicate protection). With shards, the chance is {{%03%}}% instead of the usual {{%04%}}%. If you miss, you get a new non-duplicate Epic modifier.
target: 保证掉落传说级 {{%01%}}DNA！也有{{%02%}}%的几率掉落新的传奇修饰符（带复制保护）。使用碎片时，几率为{{%03%}}%，而不是通常的{{%04%}}%。如果失手，则会获得一个新的非复制史诗修饰符。

source: Guaranteed to give at least an Epic drop of {{%01%}} DNA! This is for a randomly chosen class, shown in the description. This class randomly changes whenever you open any flask, and also at 0:00 UTC every day.
target: 保证给予精英的{{%01%}}DNA，这会给随机一个选定职业的技能，职业选择会在你每次打开一个瓶子，或者在0:00UTC时间刷新。

source: Guaranteed to give a Legendary drop of {{%01%}} DNA! This is for a randomly chosen class, shown in the description. This class randomly changes whenever you open any flask, and also at 0:00 UTC every day.

source: This flask only costs {{%01%}} ACID to open. However it will not drop DNA for your {{%02%}} most played classes.
target: 此瓶子只需要花费{{%01%}}酸液打开，但是他不会掉落你最{{%02%}}常玩的职业DNA。

source: All DNA drops go towards the last class you played. This class is shown in the description.
target: 所有的DNA掉落会给予你上次游玩的职业，会显示在下方介绍中。

source: Gives bonus XP based on how much DNA is earned. This gives at least +{{%03%}} account levels per flask, or more if you hit an Epic or Legendary.
target: 基于你的 DNA 获取量获得额外经验，这会至少给予+{{%03%}}账户等级每个瓶子，或者当抽中精英或传奇时更多。

source: Guaranteed to give you a brand new skill from rings 3 or 4, as long as some are still locked.
target: 保证给予一个全新的第三圈或第四圈的技能，只会获得锁定的技能。

source: Has a chance to upgrade your modifiers to Premium status! Premium modifiers look cool and display the biggest kill streak you earned with that modifier. They can also earn up to {{%01%}} trophies, which raises your trophy limit and shows a new badge.
Claiming this will give you a random special flask.
target: 收下会给你个随机的特殊瓶子。

source: Guarantees {{%01%}} DNA drops for the {{%02%}} class.
Gives a competitive build for the {{%01%}} class!

source: A special flask to give newbies a competitive build. All players get the same skills from this.
target: 一个特殊的瓶子，为新玩家提供一个有竞争力的构建。所有玩家都能从中获得相同的技能。

source: Guaranteed to give a Legendary drop of {{%01%}} DNA, always for the {{%02%}} class! Also has a {{%03%}}% chance to drop a new legendary modifier (with duplicate protection). With shards the chance is {{%04%}}%. If you miss, you get a new non-duplicate Epic modifier.
target: 保证掉落{{%01%}}的传奇物品 DNA，始终为{{%02%}}级！也有{{%03%}}%的几率掉落新的传奇修饰符（使用双晶保护）。使用碎片时，几率为{{%04%}}%。如果失手，则会获得一个新的非复制史诗修饰符。

source: Guaranteed to give at least an Epic drop of {{%01%}} DNA, always for the {{%02%}} class! Has a {{%04%}}% chance of a Legendary DNA drop (instead of the usual {{%05%}}%).
target: 保证至少提供{{%01%}}史诗级掉落 DNA，始终为{{%02%}}级！有{{%04%}}%的几率掉落传奇DNA（而不是通常的{{%05%}}%）。

source: You'll drop a free health kit every {{%02%}} seconds. These heal you {{%01%}}% of your missing health.
target: 每{{%02%}}秒掉落一个医疗包，恢复{{%01%}}%失去的生命值。

source: Vendors sometimes sell weapons with {{%01%}} clips worth of explosive bullets. These bullets explode on impact, dealing +{{%02%}}% damage.
target: 商人有时候出售的武器带有{{%01%}}个弹匣为爆炸弹药，这些弹药会在撞击时爆炸，造成+{{%02%}}%伤害。

source: Restore +{{%01%}} health for each bullet that hits an enemy player, civ or cop.
target: 每次子弹命中敌人回复+{{%01%}}生命值。

source: Civs and cops join your gang, automatically following you and shooting at enemies. Your max gang size is {{%01%}}.
target: 平民和条子加入你的帮派，跟随你并射击敌人，你帮派最大人数为{{%01%}}。

Your passive regen will recharge and heal +{{%01%}}% faster whenever you stand still.
target: 当站着不动时，你的被动恢复效果增加+{{%01%}}%更快。

source: Your player and hitbox also grow bigger.
target: 你的玩家和命中判定盒也会变大。

source: Harming enemies makes them drop random loot, on a {{%01%}} second cooldown. More loot is dropped the closer you are to eachother.
target: 伤害敌人会让他们掉落战利品，内置{{%01%}}秒冷却，距离敌人越近掉落的战利品越多。

source: You move +{{%01%}}% faster, and your bullets travel +{{%02%}}% faster.
target: 你的移动速度提高+{{%01%}}%，你的子弹飞行速度提高+{{%02%}}%。

source: Every {{%01%}} seconds there is a {{%02%}} second window where your bullets seek towards enemies and deal +{{%03%}}% damage.
target: 每{{%01%}}s会有{{%02%}}s内你的子弹会穿透跟踪敌人并额外造成+{{%03%}}%伤害。

source: You'll disguise yourself as a cop when at full health. At full health your police radio reveals nearby enemies, civs and cops.
target: 在满血时你会伪装成条子，并且你的警用地图会显示周围的敌人，平民和其他条子。

source: Take {{%01%}}% damage from explosives and cars, including explosive crates and Fission Mines.
target: 减少{{%01%}}%来自载具爆炸和投掷物伤害，包括爆炸箱和分裂地雷。

source: Kills during your {{%01%}}s Dagger Dance window increase the power of your upgrades by +{{%02%}}% (max +{{%03%}}%). Dying halves this bonus.
target: 在你的{{%01%}}s短剑乱舞时期击杀提高你的升级威力+{{%02%}}%(最大+{{%03%}}%)死亡时奖励减半。

source: Bullets gain damage the further they travel, dealing up to +{{%01%}}% damage at {{%02%}}m. They also have +{{%03%}}% range.
target: 子弹根据飞行距离提高伤害，最大为+{{%01%}}%伤害在{{%02%}}米，你的子弹也会获得+{{%03%}}%射程。

source: Your bullets will steer towards enemies at {{%01%}} degrees per second.
target: 你的子弹会加速冲向敌人{{%01%}}度每秒。

source: Reload weapons +{{%01%}}% faster. You also won't slow down as much when firing your gun.
target: 装填武器+{{%01%}}%更快，你也不会在开火时减速。

source: Gain +{{%01%}}% rate of fire for every level. When below {{%02%}}% health, this gain is +{{%03%}}% instead.
target: 每次升级获得+{{%01%}}%射速，当生命值低于{{%02%}}%时，替换为获得+{{%03%}}%射速。
射击移除被动恢复，持续{{%01%}}秒。

source: Your currently held guns gain +{{%01%}}% damage whenever you get a kill (capped at +{{%02%}}%).
target: 你现在的武器在当你击杀时提高+{{%01%}}%伤害(上限+{{%02%}}%)。

source: Once you collect {{%01%}} items of loot, you'll duplicate all of them. Dying halves the amount collected.
target: 当你搜集{{%01%}}战利品并不死亡，你会将他们复制一份，死亡会减少一半你已经获取的战利品。

source: Vendor upgrades that improve skills (but not weapons) cost {{%01%}}% as much.
target: 商人升级属性(非武器加成)花费{{%01%}}%。

source: Your knife deals {{%01%}} instead of {{%02%}} damage.
Deal +{{%01%}}% damage vs empty vehicles. They explode with +{{%02%}}% damage and blast size.
target: 造成+{{%01%}}%伤害对敌方载具，当车辆爆炸时候造成+{{%02%}}%伤害和爆炸范围。

source: All enemy deaths within range of your placed chemicals give you +${{%03%}} and +{{%04%}} clips worth of Ballistic Bombs in both your guns.
target: 在你放置的化学品范围内敌人死亡会给你+${{%03%}}和+{{%04%}}弹匣的弹道炸弹在你的两把武器中（僵尸收益减半）。

source: Whenever you throw an explosive you will throw +{{%01%}} extra for free shortly after.
target: 当你投掷爆炸物时短时间后额外投掷+{{%01%}}。

source: Chemical passive and active effects are +{{%01%}}% stronger. Chemicals are discounted, and they restore charges +{{%02%}}% faster.
target: 化学品被动与主动效果增强+{{%01%}}%，化学品打折并充能+{{%02%}}%更快。

source: Get +{{%01%}} reroll on valid skill drafts, and all rerolls are ${{%02%}} cheaper.
target: 在可用技能池中获得+{{%01%}}重掷次数。并所有重掷次数便宜${{%02%}}。

source: Gain +{{%01%}} hp/s and +{{%02%}}% move speed for the next {{%03%}}s after placing a chemical.
Move +{{%01%}}% faster for each skill on cooldown.
target: 每一个技能处于冷却状态时候移动速度提高+{{%01%}}%。

source: When you reach level {{%01%}}, your {{%02%}} highest level skills will automatically gain one level.
target: 当你到达等级{{%01%}}时，你的{{%02%}}最高等级的技能提升一个等级。

source: Tier 2 and tier 3 guns can be purchased a round earlier, and are always discounted.
target: 2阶与3阶武器可以提前一回合购买并总是打折。

target: 每当你转移时，有{{%01%}}%的几率召唤一个帮派成员加入你的帮派（最多{{%02%}}个帮派成员）。

target: 完成平民任务后，下一次击杀可随机获得+1商贩升级。

target: 当链接连杀时你的时间间隔为{{%01%}}秒，替代{{%02%}}秒。

target: 条子突击波次时间减少{{%01%}}%，击杀条子恢复+{{%02%}}生命值。

target: 每一点消耗在赛博改造技能树的点会提供{{%01%}}%更高的子弹伤害。

target: 只要你花费{{%01%}}点至其技能树，你就能获取最高等级至3的技能。

source: Creates a toxic puddle on the ground wherever you get a kill or destroy a car.
target: 当你击杀或摧毁车辆时创建一滩硫酸池。

source: Gives more cash and xp from killing players and cops. Especially at high wanted levels.
target: 通过击杀玩家和警察获得额外经验和现金。尤其是在通缉级别较高的情况下。

target: 对载具造成额外伤害，并且摧毁他们获得额外经验和现金。

source: Restores health by a percentage of the damage you deal to enemies.

target: 在地上释放一个烟雾弹治疗你并让你隐身。

source: Protects you at low health. Any damage blocked is added to your next bullet.
target: 在健康状况不佳时保护您。任何被阻挡的伤害都会添加到你的下一颗子弹中。

source: Both of your guns gain seeking bullets, that accumulate in their magazines over time.
target: 你的两把枪都获得跟踪子弹，他们根据时间来加入你的弹匣。

source: Marks your position with an X on the ground. If you cast again, you'll teleport back to this location and restore lost health.
target: 在你当前位置地面标记X，如果重新施法，你会传送回这里并且恢复失去的生命值。

source: Speeds up your skill cooldowns, chemical cooldowns, and restores your ammo whenever you get a kill.
target: 在你获得击杀时加速技能冷却，化学品冷却，并补充子弹。

source: Adds high damage bullets to both of your guns. These bullets accumulate over time, but only when standing nearby enemy players.
target: 给你的两把武器添加高伤弹药，这些子弹会通过时间变多，但只当站在敌方玩家附近时才增加。

source: Your bullets set enemies on fire.
Throws a free Molotov whenever you cast a skill or empty your magazine.
target: 当你释放技能或者清空弹匣的时候投掷一个免费的燃烧瓶。

source: Increases all forms of non-bullet damage (skills, grenades, cars, knife). If you get a non-bullet kill, you'll gain charges that increase this damage. Charges reset on death.
target: 提高所有的非子弹伤害(技能，手雷，车辆，小刀)，如果你获取非子弹击杀，你会获得提高伤害的充能，死亡后重置。

source: Creates a clone of yourself that damages and confuses enemies. This clone moves towards your crosshair when cast.
target: 释放一个你的分身来伤害敌人并迷惑敌人，释放时分身会走向你的准星。

source: After you cast a skill or throw a grenade, the next bullet you shoot will deal extra damage.
target: 当你施法或投掷手雷后，下一发子弹获得额外伤害。

source: A random enemy will be revealed to you in the map, and you will deal bonus damage against them. If you kill them you'll earn extra cash and XP, then get a new target.
target: 一个随机的敌人会显示在地图上，你对目标敌人造成额外伤害，击杀目标时获得额外经验和现金，并刷新目标。

source: Spawns grenades that spin around you and are randomly tossed at nearby enemies.
target: 生成手雷在你周围旋转并且随机投掷至敌人。

source: Restores your health whenever you fall from a height. If you land near an enemy you will damage them and steal their health as well.
target: 当你从高处掉落时恢复生命值，如果落点附近有敌人会窃取他们的生命值。

source: Increases your size and max health.
target: 提高你的尺寸和最大生命值。

source: Gives more shift charges and increases shift distance.
target: 获得额外闪现充能并提高闪现距离。

source: Enemies are more likely to drop Double Damage loot when you hit them. Double Damage also lasts longer.
target: 在你攻击敌人后更容易掉落双倍伤害战利品，并提高双倍伤害持续时间。

source: Deal extra damage to enemies when they have low health.
target: 对残血敌人造成额外伤害。

source: Restores your health whenever you shift.
target: 当你闪现时恢复你的生命值。

source: Gives more time to chain multi-kills. The default time is {{%01%}}s. Your kills also drop free loot, dropping more at higher multi-kill levels.
target: 连杀时间延长，默认为{{%01%}}s，你的击杀也会掉落额外战利品，根据你的连杀等级掉落额外战利品。

source: Collecting loot restores your health, and shooting crates causes their loot to fly towards you.
target: 收集战利品会恢复你的生命值，而且射击箱子会让战利品飞向你。

source: Your vehicles drive faster, heal you, and deal extra collision damage. The heal briefly continues after you exit the vehicle.
target: 你的载具驾驶更快并治疗你，而且会造成额外撞击伤害。治疗效果会在你离开载具后短暂持续。

source: Killing vendors sometimes drops rare loot.
target: 击杀商人有几率掉落稀有战利品。

source: You can throw your knife at long range.
target: 你可以投掷你的近战造成范围伤害。

source: You leave a trail of poison wherever you walk, damaging enemies who step in it.
target: 当你移动时留下一条毒素轨迹，伤害踩在上面的敌人。

source: Bazookas spin around you and fire at enemies when they hit you.
target: 火箭在你周围旋转并在敌人攻击你时自动反击回去。
从击杀中获取更多现金。
从车辆击杀获取的经验与现金。

source: Fireballs do extra damage at range.
target: 根据距离提高伤害的火球。

source: Creates vortex that slows and damages.
Creates a line of spikes on ground.
Smoke makes you invisible and heal.

target: 在健康状况不佳时保护您。

source: Marks spot, then teleports back to it.
Gain damage charges while near enemies.
target: 站在敌人周围提高伤害。

source: Throws a molotov on skill cast.
After skill cast, next bullet is deadly.
target: 施法后提高下一发伤害。

source: Kill assigned target for extra XP.
Falling heals you and harms enemies.
Extra damage vs low hp enemies.
Gives your car speed and regen.
Pretty awful as a car. But it's cheap and makes a nice step for jumping over walls.
target: 作为车来说太烂了，好在便宜，就用来跳过墙壁吧。

source: Fast and agile - just watch out for the low health. If it catches on fire you'll burn.
target: 一辆快捷的车-但要注意那点血量，它要是着火你也会跟着一起着火。

source: Fast and durable - a great all-rounder. Can survive a direct shot from a Bazooka.
target: 又快又结实的载具，总体都不错，甚至能正面硬抗一发火箭筒。

source: A good combat vehicle great for co-op drivebys. Press [F3] to hop into the back and shoot.
target: 不错的战斗载具，尤其适合装载友军协作战斗。按[F3]键可跳到背后进行360度的射击。

source: Has a radar that sees through walls and reveals the location of nearby enemies.
target: 此载具带有雷达，可发现附近敌人。拿它来当穿墙眼，透视敌人的行动吧。

source: Very durable for its price and with 6 seats it's great for transporting your squad.
target: 就性价比而言，此载具超皮实，带6个座位尤其适合装载友军协作战斗。载客越多，载具自我恢复就越快，使得蹲点阴人者变得很难对付。

source: Fastest car in the game. Hold [SHIFT] to boost and scoop up all the loot in the map.
target: 游戏中最快的车！按[SHIFT]可以加速并且到处挖走地图中的战利品。

source: Comes with a ticking time bomb. [LEFT CLICK] to toggle the timer on and off.
target: 此载具带有定时炸弹！按[鼠标左键]切换倒计时开/关状态，它爆炸时自己一定要离远点。

source: A huge truck with massive health and 5 passenger seats. The back 3 seats allow for drivebys.
target: 血条超长的大型卡车，带5个座位，其中3个后座可进行360度无死角射击。售价昂贵，但与友军乘此载具协同作战，势不可挡。

source: Fires 2 homing missiles that deal extra damage against vehicles. [LEFT CLICK] to fire.
target: 按[鼠标左键]发射2枚跟踪导弹，可对敌载具和丧尸造成巨大伤害。售价昂贵，但使用得法，必成致命大杀器。·

source: Drive the Extraction Truck to its extraction zone.
target: 把撤离卡车开到撤离点。

source: [LEFT CLICK] to fire a smoking hot Flamethrower. The Polytruck's windows are shatterproof.
target: [鼠标左键]来发射一个致命火焰，这个赛博卡车是防爆的。

source: [LEFT CLICK] to turn on the siren and scare off gangsters up to no good.
target: [鼠标左键]来启用警笛并把帮派混混吓走。

source: The SWAT van has more health, more aggression, and carries more baddies (well, technically goodies).
target: [鼠标左键]来启用警笛并把帮派混混吓走。
爆炸物(手雷，闪光弹，燃烧瓶，巴祖卡)
手枪(USP，沙鹰，信号枪，电击枪)
狙击枪(鲁格，巴雷特，中子光束)

source: Silent and deadly. Great for finishing enemies off at close range.
target: 无声且致命，适用于在近距离击杀敌人。

source: Kaboom! Deals more damage the closer it lands to your enemies.
target: 轰隆！如果手雷在守卫附近爆炸，他们会朝声响的方向查看。

source: Explodes with a huge flash of light that blinds nearby enemies.
target: 爆炸并发出巨大闪光，几秒内致盲附近敌人。它爆炸时，要先躲好，别闪着自己。

source: Fires a homing missile that deals huge damage against vehicles.
target: 发射一发火箭弹，可对载具或丧尸群造成严重伤害。附近的守卫会朝爆炸声响的方向查看。

source: Pistols can swap between weapons faster.
target: 手枪在武器间切换更快。

source: Does extra damage vs civs and cops. Pistols let you swap between weapons faster.
target: 对平民和条子造成额外伤害，手枪让你切换武器更快。

source: An extremely mobile superweapon that fires bullets that slow civs and cops. Pistols let you swap between weapons faster.
target: 一种极度移动的超级武器，可以减缓敌人的速度。

source: Light weight so you move quickly while firing.
target: 减少重量会让你在射击时跑的更快。

source: A high rof and high movement speed make this a great all-round weapon.
target: 低后坐力，高移动力，总体评价很靠谱。

source: An extremely high damage superweapon. Its bullets pierce through enemies.
target: 伤害极高的超级武器。它的子弹可以穿透敌人。

source: Does huge damage at point blank range.
target: 有限距离内可秒杀敌人，超出距离就不行了，只能击晕敌人。

source: An auto-shotgun with huge close range DPS.
target: 近距离输出惊人的自动霰弹枪。冲到敌人身边，再把他们崩飞。

source: A powerful superweapon that fires explosive bullets and can blast jump you into the air.
target: 一个厉害的超级武器发射爆炸弹药。并会把你炸到空中。

source: Fast and accurate bullets make this effective at range, but the accuracy is awful while shifting.
target: 快速并精准的弹药让他在远距离中更有效，但是在闪现中失去精准度。

source: Accurate and great at range. Fires in short bursts of 4 bullets.
target: 精准的远距离武器，三连发。

source: An extremely accurate superweapon that fires seeking bullets.
target: 大杀器之一，发射准得要命的跟踪子弹。锁定敌人，发射的子弹会自动追踪他们，输出又快又狠的伤害。

source: Deals big damage, especially against vehicles. But you'll move slowly while firing and have awful accuracy.
target: 造成更大伤害，特别是对载具造成的伤害，但是当射击时你的移动速度变慢并精准度严重降低。

source: Deals huge damage at extra long range.
target: 超大弹匣，可对载具输出严重伤害。会减慢移动速度，移动中射击还啥都打不着。

source: An extremely high damage superweapon that deals extra damage against vehicles.
target: 大杀器之一，可对载具输出严重伤害。

source: A sniper with an extended scope lets you see enemies further away.
target: 给你一个加长瞄准镜来看的更远并从屏幕外狙击他们。

source: Fires extremely fast and deadly bullets and with a scope for long range sniping.
target: 经典的狙击枪，带瞄准镜可提供额外观察范围。发射又快又准的子弹，杀伤力随飞行距离而增加。

source: A deadly superweapon that fires a beam of photons. Its bullets pierce through enemies.
target: 长距离大杀器，发射一束光子，可击穿敌方掩体或防御技能效果。作为究极狙击武器而言，有着极高的精度和杀伤力。

source: Tosses a flaming bottle that explodes on impact and deals damage over time.
target: 投掷一个燃烧的瓶子在冲击时爆炸并对区域造成持续伤害。

source: Fires a flare that explodes on impact. Good for shooting enemies behind cover. Pistols let you swap between weapons faster.
target: 发射一个信号弹，受到撞击时爆炸，跟小火箭筒一样。

source: Shoots deadly fire that passes through enemies, vehicles and defensive skills.
target: 射出致命的火焰伤害穿透敌人，载具与防御技能。

source: Aww man, you got blood on my shirt.
target: 老铁啊，血都溅我身上了。

source: Nearby allies support you by slowly regenerating your mana and health.
target: 邻近友军正在缓慢回复你的HP和灵能。
鼠标停在这里可查看技能菜单

source: Left click skills to add them. Right click to view them.
target: 鼠标左键点击技能来添加，右键点击来预览。

source: Click 'Start Adding Skills' to create a skill build.
target: 点击'开始添加技能点'创建技能组。

source: Win 4 HEARTS before the round ends to revive! The timer is top left.
target: 在回合结束前获取4个心以复生。倒计时在左上角。

source: Make sure you revive before overtime! It begins in {{%01%}}.
target: 超时时间开始于{{%01%}}。在那之前赶快重生。

source: If you die during overtime, get hearts by killing zombies.
target: 如果你在超时时间死亡，击杀僵尸来获得心心。

source: Hold ({{%01%}}) to send a quick message, or press ({{%02%}}) to chat.
Kill enemies to earn XP and level up.
target: 击杀敌人获得经验与升级，这会给你技能点。

source: Enter a car with ({{%01%}}), then kill a cop. You can shoot out the window when your car isn't moving.
target: 按({{%01%}})进入汽车,然后击杀警察，当车停止时可以向窗外射击。

source: Hold ({{%01%}}) and click 'Reset Skill Build' from the drop-down skills menu up the top of the screen.
target: 按住({{%01%}})并从下落技能目录中点击。

source: Press ({{%01%}}) to cast. The cooldown is shown below, use it wisely!
target: 按下({{%01%}})施放。冷却时间如下所示，请合理使用！

source: This is the Outbreak game mode. To win you need to kill zombies, collect their souls and return them to the bomb.
target: 这里是大爆发游戏模式。想赢得游戏，需要击杀丧尸，收集掉落的尸魂，再回填到炸弹里并引爆。尽量使用范围杀伤，要比仅用枪射击有效得多。

source: After collecting souls you need to return them to the bomb. Follow the arrow on your screen to take your souls to the bomb. Hold (TAB) to see scores.
target: 收集尸魂后，需要回填到炸弹里，每次回填都有分数、金钱、灵能、生命值和经验奖励。按HUD上显示的白色箭头行动，把尸魂填入炸弹。按住(TAB)键可查看分数。

source: Up the top right you'll see your 'Survivor Income'. This cash and XP is given on your next kill, and only grows when alive.
target: 在右上角你会看见你的'幸存收入，此现金与经验会在你下次击杀时奖励，并只有当你活着时上涨。

source: Escape the blue circle in the map. It will chase you, so use a car ({{%01%}}) and boost ({{%02%}}) to go fast!
target: 逃离地图上的蓝圈，他会跟着你的，用车辆({{%01%}})并加速({{%02%}})！

source: Kill enemies during overtime to earn bonus score. Good luck!
target: 在加时赛中杀死敌人，获得额外分数。祝你好运！

source: If you don't reach the final 5, all good! You can keep looting to level up for next round.
target: 如果你没能达到前5名，不要灰心！你也能继续搜寻战利品为下回合做准备。

source: Chemicals give you permanent passive benefits. Find a vendor and buy a FISSION MINE chemical.
target: 化学品给予永久被动效果，找一个商人并且购买一个分裂地雷。

source: Place your 'Fission Mine' with ({{%01%}}). This creates a hidden bomb in the map. This uses a charge, which restores over time. Chemical charges are shown above the weapons on the right.
target: 安放你的分裂地雷({{%01%}})。这会在地上安放一个隐藏的炸弹，会消耗一次充能但会根据时间恢复，化学充能次数在右边的武器上方。

source: Stand inside your shop and buy something. You can place shops as long as you have charges.
target: 站在你的商店里购买一些东西，你只要有充能就你放置商店。

source: Pick up your chemical by standing in it and pressing ({{%01%}}).
target: 站在你的化学剂并按下({{%01%}})来拾取。

source: In Conquest you need to capture all of the Control Points in the map.
target: 这是占领模式，你需要占领地图上所有的据点。你可以配合'占领者'化学药剂加速占领。在出生点购买'占领者'化学药剂。

source: Capture a point by standing next to it. The more allies nearby, the faster you will capture.
target: 站在占领点附近来占领它，周围的队友更多，占领速度越快。

source: This is the Extraction game mode. Follow the white arrow on your screen to capture the enemy flag.
target: 这里是提取游戏模式。想赢得游戏，需要占领目标(像是旗帜、电台或卡车)，并带回对应的提取区域。按HUD上白色箭头指示行动，占领当前目标。

source: Follow the arrow and take the flag to the enemy flag near your spawn. Hold (TAB) to see scores.
target: 一旦占领了目标，就必须提取它。按HUD上白色箭头指示行动，到达对应提取区域。成功提取目标，可奖励己方全员大量分数，所以好好配合吧！按住(TAB)键来查看分数。

source: This is the Checkpoint game mode. To win you need do laps with the Battery in a vehicle. Grab a car, then follow the white arrow on your screen to pick up the Battery.
target: 这里是剧情点游戏模式。想赢得游戏，需要捡起电池，放进载具，完成通过全部剧情点的跑圈。购买载具，按HUD上白色箭头指示行动，占领电池。

source: Follow the white arrow on your screen to drive the battery through each of the checkpoints. Hold (TAB) to see scores.
target: 载着电池，完成通过全部剧情点的跑圈。按HUD上白色箭头指示行动，通过全部重生点。如果是敌方载着电池，你可以在设置路障妨害他们跑圈。按住(TAB)键来查看分数。

source: Stand inside an enemy chemical, hold ({{%01%}}), and select 'Neutralize Chemicals' to destroy it.
target: 站在敌军化学剂，并按住({{%01%}})，选择'中和化学品'来摧毁它。

source: Press (F10) to finish this tutorial. This opens the How to Play Guide if you want to learn more.
target: 你通过了新人练习，按(F10)来结束训练。如果你想要知道更多这会打开玩法指南。

source: Win round 3 to win the game. Get kills and level up skills to prepare!
target: 赢下第 3 轮即可赢得比赛。提升技能等级，做好准备！

source: Be the last man standing to finish the tutorial!
target: 成为最后的幸存者来结束训练！

source: Tip: Remember to level up your skills.
Tip: Stay out of combat to restore your health.
target: 小贴士：脱离战斗以回血。

source: Tip: Try to reload after each kill.
target: 小贴士：击杀后记得装弹。

source: Follow the vendor arrow, hold ({{%01%}}), and upgrade your gun.
target: 跟随供应商箭头并按住（{{%01%}}）升级你的枪。

source: Press ({{%01%}}) to shift behind cover and restore health.
target: 按下{{%01%}}以闪现至掩体后并恢复生命值。

source: To win the game, win round 3. Buy a MINIGUN and prepare to fight!
target: 要赢得游戏，必须赢得第3轮。购买一把三阶武器并准备！

source: The cops are coming! Press ({{%01%}}) to dodge their bullets.
target: 条子来了！按下({{%01%}})来躲避他们的子弹。

source: The cops are coming! Right Click to dodge their bullets.
target: 条子来了！按下鼠标右键来躲避子弹。

source: A full game has 3 rounds, but you only need to win the FINAL round. Use earlier rounds to level up and prepare. Good luck!
target: 一局完整游戏有4个回合，但是你只需要赢得最后回合，在早期回合中升级并准备最终试炼！

source: Kill players in red to level up! Right click to dash!
Find a civilian with a blue text bubble and press ({{%01%}}).
target: 探索并找到一个蓝色对话框并按下({{%01%}})。

source: Missions are shown above the map. Do them to level up faster!
target: 任务显示在地图上方。完成这些任务可以更快地提升等级！

source: Learn to play and earn bonus XP!
target: 试着按新手指南操作吧！顺序完成每个步骤，都有经验值奖励！

source: The player count, timer, and your score are shown here.
target: 玩家数量，计时器还有你的分数在这里显示。

source: Your health, lives and shifts are shown down here.
target: 你的生命值，灵能还有闪现次数在这下面显示。

source: Press Q to switch weapons, and middle mouse to throw grenades.
target: 按Q切换武器，按鼠标滚轮投掷手雷。

source: Press 1, 2, 3 to cast skills. Hold ALT to spend skill points.

source: Press (ENTER) to bring up the chat log. The green lines have important tips. Also when playing singleplayer you can hold (ALT) to pause the game and read the text at your own pace.
target: 按回车键打开聊天记录，绿字信息都是重要提示。单人游戏时，也可按住(ALT)键暂停游戏，慢慢阅读提示信息。

source: Stay out of combat for a few seconds to trigger auto-heal. Use vehicles for protection while looting. Unlock healing skills with (ALT). Buy expensive weapons to deal extra damage.
target: 暂时离开战斗来治疗你自己。站在圆形的检查点内即可按下(B)键购买武器。最后，按下(ALT)键来解锁治愈技能，并使用右键、C键和F键来使用这些技能。

source: To win, simply be the last man standing on the final round. The best way to do this is to earn cash and XP in the earlier rounds to become as strong as possible.
target: 想胜利，只需要在最后回合活到最后。最好的方式是在早期回合中获得现金和经验来发育自己。

source: Kill civilians and players to earn cash and XP. Unlock healing skills and buy a tier 2 gun as soon as possible. If you become a zombie, head towards a heart crate to try revive.
target: 避免死亡圈，并试着活着。如果你成为一个僵尸，利用这段时间抢劫现金，技能和化学剂。使用跃迁力场快速传送到中心购买区。

source: When you view the skills page through the main menu you're looking at your permanent skill build. This build is only used in permanent multiplayer servers and persists between rounds. This build is not used in quickmatches or the campaign.
target: 通过主菜单浏览到技能页面，现在看到的是你的永久技能组合。此组合只可用于永久多人服务器，比赛中不可更改。此组合不可用于快速比赛或战役模式。

source: DLC owners can host their own legacy game modes and play against bots. To play against humans it's better to join an official server.
target: 你或许不想看见这些信息。想玩多人游戏，请加入官方服务器！想与朋友们一起玩战役模式，请点击战役模式页面，再加入游戏即可。

source: This saves your current arrangement of equipped skills and perks. You can also toggle off skills with the button in the bottom right.
target: 这会保存你所有的技能与天赋配装，你也能通过右下角的按钮关闭技能。

source: Don't make your build too small. Bigger skill builds have a higher chance for your skills to get bonus points and start at level 2.
target: 别让你的构筑太小，更大的构筑会获得额外几率让你开局获得额外技能点并且以等级2开局。

source: Free accounts can only save {{%01%}} builds at a time. Delete an existing build, or get the DLC to create as many builds as you want!
target: 基本账户只能保存{{%01%}}构筑，删除一个现有构筑或获取DLC来建立无限的构筑！

source: TIP: Want to get onto a rooftop? Stand on a car and blow it up to launch into the sky.
target: 小贴士：想去屋顶吗？站在车上并把他打爆来发射上天。

source: TIP: During overtime, heart crates drop less often. Be alive when the timer hits 0:00.
target: 小贴士：在超时时间中，心之容器掉落更少，最好在倒计时归0前保证活着。

source: TIP: Vote for round modifiers that synergize with your class or skill build.
target: 小贴士：投票选择能配合与你的职业或构筑的回合编辑器。

source: TIP: When using a jumppad, you can cancel your motion in mid-air by shifting.
target: 小贴士：当使用跳板时，你可以通过在空中闪现来取消惯性，这是个上屋顶的好办法。

source: TIP: During overtime, stick to the edge of the shrinking circle to stay alive.
target: 小贴士：在超时时间中，贴在圈边能多活一会。

source: TIP: Tier 2 guns become available in round 2, and tier 3 guns appear in round 3.
target: 小贴士：2阶武器在第二回合可购买，3阶武器在第三回合购买。

source: TIP: Use vehicles to loot the map faster and reach supply drops before they land.
target: 小贴士：使用载具来更快收集战利品并在物资掉落前到达降落点。

source: TIP: Pre-place chemicals in the showdown area ahead of time to get a hidden advantage.
target: 小贴士：提前安放化学品在最终决斗区以获取隐秘的优势。

source: TIP: Stock up grenades before the final showdown, they're great for busting cover.
target: 小提示：在大决战前囤积点手雷，他们非常擅长于把人逼出掩体。

source: TIP: Get multi-kills vs cops and kill streaks vs players to farm faster.
target: 小贴士：更有效率的刷钱是快速的连续击杀玩家和条子。

source: TIP: You'll unlock gun skins faster by playing multiple classes, instead of just one.
target: 小贴士：你会通过游玩不同职业解锁武器皮肤更快。

source: TIP: Click the Reroll button when drafting to see new skills and create better combos.
target: 小贴士：在抽技能时点击重掷按钮来查看新的技能并建立更好的连击。

source: TIP: Create class-specific modifier builds that synergize with that class perks.
target: 小贴士：创建特定类别的修改器构建，与该类别的津贴协同增效。
